original_text: People should know that she has done good things. For example, she must have been a good mother to her children. She must have received visitors into her home. She must have helped God's people as their servant. She must have taken care of people who had problems. She must have continued to do all kinds of good things like that.
korean_text: 선한 행실의 증거가 있어 혹은 자녀를 양육하며 혹은 나그네를 대접하며 혹은 성도들의 발을 씻으며 혹은 환난 당한 자들을 구제하며 혹은 모든 선한 일을 행한 자라야 할 것이요

sentences.original_text: People should know that she has done good things.
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들은 그녀가 선한 일을 했다는 것을 알아야 합니다.

sentences.original_text: For example, she must have been a good mother to her children.
sentences.korean_translation: 예를 들어, 그녀는 자녀들에게 좋은 어머니였을 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: She must have received visitors into her home.
She must have helped God's people as their servant.
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 종으로서 하나님의 백성들을 도왔을 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: She must have taken care of people who had problems.
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 어려움을 겪는 사람들을 돌보았을 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: She must have continued to do all kinds of good things like that.
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 그와 같은 온갖 선한 일을 계속했을 것입니다.
